title: Part C
stimulusHtml:

Because B(60)−B(40) 60−40 = 49−9 20 =2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGcbGaaiikaiaaiAdacaaIWaGaaiykaiabgkHiTiaadkeacaGGOaGa aGinaiaaicdacaGGPaaabaGaaGOnaiaaicdacqGHsislcaaI0aGaaG imaaaacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaisdacaaI5aGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaaqa aiaaikdacaaIWaaaaiabg2da9iaaikdaaaa@4983@ , the Mean Value Theorem implies there is a time t, 40 < t < 60, such that v(t) = 2.
